content:
Dr. Xiaoliang FAN got a Ph.D degree in Computer Science from University Pierre and Marie Curie (now Sorbonne Université) in France in 2012. Now he works at Fujian Key Lab of Sensing and Computing for Smart Cities (Xiamen University) and ASC Lab as a Senior Research Specialist. His research interests include Spatio-temporal Data Mining, Privacy-preserving Computing & AI algorithms. He has published 60+ journal (IEEE TMC/TITS/TSC, etc.) and conference (AAAI, IJCAI, UbiComp, etc.) papers, and has obtained/ applied for 8/14 Chinese invention patents. His works are funded by NSFC and many industry collaborators. Dr. FAN is an IEEE Senior Member, and CCF (China Computer Federation) Senior Member.
 Download my resumé. --
summary: Dr. Xiaoliang FAN got a Ph.D degree in Computer Science from University Pierre and Marie Curie (now Sorbonne Université) in France in 2012. Now he works at Fujian Key Lab of Sensing and Computing for Smart Cities (Xiamen University) and ASC Lab as a Senior Research Specialist.
title: Xiaoliang Fan

content:
Professor, August 2011 – current, Department of Computer Science Associate Dean for Research and International Relations, 2013-current, School of Information Science and Engineering, Founder and Deputy Director, 2015-current, Fujian Key Lab. on Sensing and Computing for Smart City, @ Xiamen University, Xiamen City, Fujian, China
Associate Professor, December 2004 –August 2011, Lecturer, December 2002 - December 2004, @ School of Electronic Science and Engineering, National University of Defense Technology, Changsha City, Hunan, China.
my webpage is http://chwang.xmu.edu.cn/
 Download my resumé. --
